message.body: Is GARY up at the cottage did you happen to go with him?
Gary is I'm home. How is Tom, did he have the MRI? DoeÂ¦n't he have metal in his knees?
No the MRI is on Tuesday evening but I'm not sure what you mean about having Neves
What do you mean about having metal in his knees
Didn't he have knee replacement using metal? If he has metal in his body he can't have an MRi.
Hope they figure that out by Tuesday night
